divs: sighting detailswhere i lived at that time there was a small convenience store on the property (rental homes\campground). i was walking home from the store when i saw a large pink, hazy light motionles in the sky. i watched it for a minute or two, then told my son who was in the house to come and see this for himself. we stood there, looking up at it as it moved around the sky, other people who were going to or coming from the store also saw it and joined us on my lawn. there were at one time perhaps 12-15 people watching it. it stayed visible and active for a considerable length of time, i remember even getting tired of standing and sat on the grass watching it while it varied from bright, to dim and back several times and moved sometimes at great speed from point to point (there were no tall structures or trees to obstruct our view, which was an arc of about 80 degrees) and suddenly stop, at other times it would lazily meander to another location only to do it again and again. it also changed colors during this display. a milky white, pale blue, yellow glow. always in pastel type colors possibly due to the light cloud cover overhead. it never came close to the ground, always above the wispy cloud cover, so it's actual height was impossible to judge. total time, to the best of my recollection was 1\2 to 3\4 hour. at the end of the display it shot off at incredible speed to the sse at an angle of about 60 degrees upward. covering a huge amount of sky before disapearing. this sighting is very limited and vague, but it's the bast i can do without lying. this is the first and worst of three sightings i've experienced in 65 years. the other two were more distinct. one more item: whether or not you beleive me doesn't matter. i know what i saw and i'm writing down..take it or leave it.
Summary: Light in the sky behaving abnormally
